long_description: One of the toughest, watertight, equipment-protector cases available with 428.5 cubic inches of storage space. Protects your camera gear, computer and other sensitive equipment from moisture damage up to 1m under water for up to 30 minutes. Pre-scored foam inside allows you to customize case to protect your valuables. Made of a lightweight, space-age structural resin. Features an atmospheric purge valve, neoprene O-ring seal and fold-down handle. Internal dimensions are 9-3/8 x 7-1/4 x 6-1/8 inches.
short_description: One of the toughest, watertight, equipment-protector cases available with 428.5 cubic inches of storage space.
